informational_findings.title: Public State Variable
informational_findings.description: 检测到显式设置为 public 的状态变量 (State Variable Visibility)
informational_findings.fix_suggestion: Review if the state variable needs to be public. If it contains sensitive data, change visibility to private or internal and provide controlled getter functions if needed.
